column1: Smoque BBQ////DAMN good slaw. I believe I am the slaw nazi because I am always critical of it
column2: and I don't like vinegar based so much
column3: but boy do they know what they are doing. Simple. One type of cabbage chopped not shredded like crazy
column4: and some thinly sliced red onion. Little bit of pepper the slightly vinegary base
column5: can't go wrong. Not drenched not too peppery. Only complaint was that I wanted MORE! 5/5
